title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1002.6 - Interest eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1002.6 - Interest eligibility

State Regulations
(a) Effective through June 30, 1989, interest shall be calculated and paid at the
daily rate pursuant to section
1002.7
of this Part on all
interest-eligible payments, as determined in accordance with section
1002.3
of this Part, when the
payment date is more than 45 calendar days after the ROI date. (b) Effective July 1, 1989, interest shall be
calculated and paid at the daily rate pursuant to section
1002.7
of this Part on all
interest-eligible payments, as determined in accordance with section
1002.3
of this Part, when the
payment date is more than 30 calendar days, excluding legal holidays, after the
ROI date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1002.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
